title: Charlie Kirk suspect confessed in hidden note to roommate, prosecutors allege
description: The 22-year-old has been charged with murder and is facing the death penalty if convicted at trial.

title: 'The bombing has been insane': Palestinians scramble to flee Israeli assault on Gaza City
description: Palestinians tell the BBC whole residential blocks have been levelled as the Israeli army ramps up its offensive in the city.

title: Israel has committed genocide in Gaza, UN commission of inquiry says
description: The panel finds that four of the five genocidal acts defined under international law have been carried out against Palestinians during the war.

title: Acting legend Robert Redford dies aged 89
description: The acting star was famous for roles in The Sting and Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid.

title: Canadian writer Robert Munsch approved for assisted dying
description: Munsch was diagnosed with dementia in 2021 and also has Parkinson's disease.

title: Syria's worst drought in decades pushes millions to the brink
description: The drought has slashed wheat harvests by 40% in a country where nearly 90% of the population already lives in poverty.

title: Judge dismisses terrorism charges against Luigi Mangione
description: Judge Gregory Carro also ruled a second-degree murder charge against Mangione could stand during a hearing on Tuesday.

title: Coup plot charges for former Romanian presidential candidate
description: Prosecutors say the right-wing former presidential candidate conspired to overthrow constitutional order in the country.

title: Malawians await presidential poll result in vote dominated by economic woes
description: If no candidate wins more than half the votes, the top two contenders will head to a run-off.

title: Chinese-linked mining firms sued over 'ecological catastrophe' in Zambia
description: Million of litres of highly acidic waste spilled into rivers in a copper-mining area, farmers say.

title: Kenya issues arrest warrant for British national over young mother's murder
description: The 21-year-old was killed in 2012 and her body found in a septic tank in the garrison town of Nanyuki.

title: Fears balloon of a return to civil war in South Sudan over treason trial
description: The political rift that could spiral into conflict again after the vice-president was accused of treason.

title: US designates Colombia as country 'failing to cooperate in drug war'
description: For the first time in almost three decades Colombia loses its certification as a US ally in the war on drugs.

title: TikTokers arrested for insulting Somalia's president in a dance video
description: The young men are seen dancing to a remix of a campaign song, with altered lyrics.

title: Artefacts recovered from Titanic's sunk sister ship
description: Items retrieved from the wreck of HMHS Britannic in the Aegean include a bell and binoculars, Greece says.

title: Deal is done to keep TikTok in the US, says Trump
description: The social media platform had faced a ban in the US over national security concerns.

title: Federal court blocks Trump from sacking Lisa Cook
description: Trump is trying to oust Cook from her role as part of a standoff between the president and the US central bank.

title: Sabrina Carpenter and Justin Bieber to headline Coachella 2026
description: Karol G will also top the bill at the festival held in the Californian desert.

title: Trump says he will sue New York Times for $15bn
description: He has accused the paper of defamation and libel, saying it served as a "mouthpiece" for Democrats.

title: Nigerian chef breaks world record for largest jollof rice dish
description: Guinness World Records confirms the achievement, saying the rice weighed in at a staggering 8,780kg.

title: Bowen: UN commission report on genocide is blunt indictment of Israel's actions in Gaza
description: A new report accuses Israel of committing genocide in Gaza, in "the strongest and most authoritative UN finding to date".

title: 'The hungry can't stay silent' - behind deadly protests in oil-rich Angola
description: As the 50th independence anniversary approaches the country grapples with poverty and inequality.

title: 'The bombing has been insane': Palestinians scramble to flee Israeli assault on Gaza City
description: Palestinians tell the BBC whole residential blocks have been levelled as the Israeli army ramps up its offensive in the city.

title: Beaten and held in Russia for three years - but never charged with a crime
description: Russia imprisoned Dmytro shortly after its invasion of Ukraine in 2022. He was freed last month.

title: Trump's state visit is mired with potential pitfalls despite careful planning
description: Months of preparations have gone into this state visit - but the Lord Mandelson question is not the only concern troubling insiders.
